author: wsjcom
title: If Machines Take Over, Who Will Be in Charge?
text:
Technology has been facing a reckoning, with many people calling it frenemy No. 1. While some experts at The Wall Street Journalâ€™s Future of Everything Festival Tuesday offered warnings about the lack of oversight and management and the level of distraction, the broader theme focused on how entrepreneurs and other doers and thinkers have harnessed the chaos to their advantage across industries.
